name: places/ChIJ-ejDR5xZwokR1r1o9IrvxW0
formattedAddress: 114 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 114 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
One of the biggest regrets of my life was letting her inject me with sculptra- a product I knew nothing about prior to meeting her. My face will remain deformed for 2-5 years, I have to wear tape on my face just to leave the house. Do you know what it's like to live counting down the months?

She has had 0 accountability or sympathy for the real pain she has caused me. She hasn't called me once. Not a single follow up call has been made, instead I have been passed off to the owner, Dr. Sadick, who's solution is to inject more product.

Every risk I brought up that could occur, she assured me would not. She told me to trust her implicitly. I've never met a doctor more confident, sensitive, and sympathetic than her. Yet, as soon as you make a mistake you disappear? The amount of tears I have shed are well worth the 3k refund your office is refusing to provide. They are hiding behind consent forms that I signed in response to all of your assurances! You left me devastated. Does that mean anything to you?

originalText.text: I am so happy I found Dr Ferzli! Georgina has been the most helpful resource in improving my skincare routine, and is always incredibly honest and real with me about the value of certain treatments or products. She is to the point, while educating you thoroughly on what she is seeing or recommending. Can't recommend her enough for basic skin checks all the way through to aesthetic procedures.

originalText.text:
I had a great experience visiting doctor Ferzli's office.
I had a breakout of a few bumps and they were very flexible with my schedule and I was able to get an appointment the next day.

The office staff was friendly and professional and my appointment started on time.

Once I saw the doc she assessed the situation and gave animmediate plan for how to address my breakout.

After two days I was 100 percent better. Great visit and result.

originalText.text: From Helen at the front desk who greets you with a big smile & welcome, to Anika the MA who is so sweet this office is golden. Then Dr Georgina comes is and it’s  game time. She is a top shelf 5 star physician. Her bedside manner, her expertise is amazing. She is a true artist. I would recommend to my family & friends with confidence. G G

originalText.text: I've rewritten this review several times to try and adequately describe how wonderful Dr. Ferzli is. She is a creative and brilliant practitioner who is always willing to spend the time necessary to put her patient at ease. She's incredibly thorough and cares about her patients and her work above all else. And she's also just a joy to be around! I cannot recommend her highly enough.
